page.title: 07LOCAL NEWS : THE COURIER
page.content: {THE INVERNESS COURIER}FIRST STARTED IN 1817 AND IS STILL GOING STRONG IN 1985.20 000 COPIES OF THE PAPER ARE PRINTED ON MONDAY AND THURSDAY EACH WEEK.REPORTERS GO OUT AND FIND NEWS FOR THE PAPER.THEY ASK AMBULANCE SERVICE,POLICE AND THE FIRE BRIGADE FOR ANY NEWS.THEY ALSO REPORT ON THE BUSINESS OF THE DISTRICT AND REGIONAL COUNCILS.THEY HAND THEIR WRITTEN REPORTS TO THE CHIEF EDITOR WHO CORRECTS ANY ERRORS.THE PAPER CONTAINS NOT ONLY NEWS,BUT ALSO ADVERTISEMENTS AND OTHER ITEMS OF LOCAL INTEREST. PEOPLE WRITE OR PHONE IN ABOUT LOCAL ISSUES WHICH CONCERN THEM SUCH AS SHOPS OPENING ON A SUNDAY.THE INVERNESS COURIER IS THE MOST POPULAR LOCAL PAPER.
